Definition.WordDefinition: post doc n 1: a grant that funds postdoctoral study or research [syn: {postdoc}] 2: a scholar or researcher who is involved in academic study beyond the level of a doctoral degree [syn: {postdoc}]
postdoc n 1: a grant that funds postdoctoral study or research [syn: {post doc}] 2: a scholar or researcher who is involved in academic study beyond the level of a doctoral degree [syn: {post doc}]
